# Church News Hub Project Instructions

This is a secure church news hub website built with PHP and Tailwind CSS.

## Project Overview
- **Backend**: PHP with secure authentication and database integration
- **Frontend**: Tailwind CSS for responsive design
- **Features**: News articles, announcements, links, featured images
- **Admin Panel**: Complete content management system
- **Security**: Input validation, SQL injection prevention, XSS protection

## Development Guidelines
- Follow secure coding practices for PHP
- Use prepared statements for all database queries
- Validate and sanitize all user inputs
- Implement proper session management
- Use HTTPS in production
- Regular security updates and patches

## File Structure
- `/public/` - Web-accessible files
- `/admin/` - Admin panel interface
- `/includes/` - PHP configuration and utilities
- `/database/` - Database setup and migrations
- `/assets/` - CSS, JS, images
- `/uploads/` - User-uploaded content (secured)
